title: Mac Rumors
content: Founded and owned by Arnold Kim, MacRumors attracts a broad audience of both consumers and professionals interested in the latest technologies and products.

title: Krabby patty
content: One frozen patty, fresh lettuce, crisp onions, two tomato slices, one slice of sea cheese, two pickels, mustard ketchup, and the Krabby Patty secret formula

title: McChikcen
content: McChicken Patty. McChicken Patty, Regular Bun, Regular Bun, Shredded Lettuce, Shredded Lettuce, Mayonnaise
